title: Evelines Visitant by Mary Elizabeth Braddon

content.question: In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents an interpretation and may establish a line of reasoning. Select and use evidence to develop and support your line of reasoning. Explain the relationship between the evidence and your thesis. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

frqParts.text: In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents an interpretation and may establish a line of reasoning. Select and use evidence to develop and support your line of reasoning. Explain the relationship between the evidence and your thesis. skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
